name: Chief Minister's Breakfast Scheme
short_description: Free nutritious breakfast for government school students to improve attendance and nutrition.
full_description: This scheme provides free breakfast to students in government primary schools across Tamil Nadu. The program aims to improve nutritional status, increase school attendance, and reduce dropout rates.
application_process:
1. Enroll child in government primary school
2. No separate application needed
3. Breakfast provided automatically to all students
4. Parents can verify through school authorities

name: Free Electricity for Farmers
short_description: Free electricity supply for agricultural pump sets to support farming activities.
full_description: Tamil Nadu government provides free electricity to farmers for agricultural purposes. This scheme covers electricity charges for pump sets used for irrigation, helping farmers reduce cultivation costs.
application_process:
1. Apply for agricultural electricity connection
2. Submit land ownership documents
3. Provide Aadhaar and farmer ID
4. TANGEDCO will process and provide connection
5. Free electricity automatically applied to agricultural connections
